text: Alan Rockwell Abraham, (February 1, 1931 â€“ October 2, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was the 27th Lieutenant Governor of Nova Scotia between February 1, 1984 to February 20, 1989. Abraham was born in Halifax, Nova Scotia. In 1996, he was made a Member of the Order of Canada. Abraham died on October 2, 2020 in Halifax at the age of 89.The Honourable Alan Rockwell Abraham ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Halifax, Nova Scotia
title: Alan Abraham
